description: Some [SUGARDUMP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1042) variants required a user to enable a macro within a malicious .xls file for execution.(Citation: Mandiant UNC3890 Aug 2022)

external_references.description: Mandiant Israel Research Team. (2022, August 17). Suspected Iranian Actor Targeting Israeli Shipping, Healthcare, Government and Energy Sectors. Retrieved September 21, 2022.
